title: Ghost Protocol: Erased Fight Back
outcome: The erased citizens who dropped from watchlists launch a coordinated takeover of citywide broadcast infrastructure. They broadcast their testimonies of disappearance, directly implicating Halden's secret 2024 data centralization. As public sympathy rises, lower-level BCI administrators defect, and Innovators urge offering the ghosts a mediated voice in re-building governance.

events.description: Dozens of vanished citizens override local broadcast channels, sharing their stories, vanishing dates, and warning about BCI's manipulation since 2024.
The city is riveted by personal testimonies, fueling protests and demands to halt all BCI enforcement. Lower-level BCI staff begin defecting, many helping spread resistance messages.
The Innovators propose, publicly, an amnesty and mediated hearings for erased citizens to tell their stories and participate in reshaping governance.
Council factions fracture under pressure as Directorate leaders refuse amnesty, leading to a deadlock and further breakdown in BCI governance.
